docs.text: Meow.js A way to communicate with the Scratch API. NOTE: All functions are async. Install This module is for Node.js . Install with npm: npm install meowing ..or yarn: yarn install meowing Discuss You can discuss Meow.js on the Scratch Forum Topic .
docs.title: Meow.js

docs.text: A way to communicate with the Scratch API. NOTE: All functions are async.
docs.title: Meow.js

docs.text: This module is for Node.js . Install with npm: npm install meowing ..or yarn: yarn install meowing
docs.title: Install

docs.text: You can discuss Meow.js on the Scratch Forum Topic .
docs.title: Discuss

docs.text: ScratchSession All functions are async unless noted. Create a ScratchSession const { ScratchSession } = require('meowing') let session = new ScratchSession(process.env.user, process.env.pass) // Logs in to scratch session.login().then(async () => { // Logout await session.logout() }) Functions login() Logs the object into scratch. getPost(id) Gets a Forum Post . Parameter type Description id number The post id. getTopic(id) Gets a Topic . Parameter type Description id number The topic id. getForum(id) Gets a Forum . Parameter type Description id number The forum id. getSignature() Gets the currently logged in user's Signature .
docs.title: ScratchSession

docs.text: All functions are async unless noted.

docs.text: Post The post object. Represents a forum post. You can get this object by using the ScratchSession. getPost(id) function. Functions update(body) Updates the post with the given bbcode (the body parameter). Parameter type Description body string The bbcode you want to update the signature with. Properties content.html The HTML of the post. content.bb The BBCode of the post. id The id of the post. topic The post's topic id. author The author of the post. postedAt A UTC string of the time the post was posted.
docs.title: Post
